Notes.Text:
This update contains Opera 38.0.2220.29, fixing a number of security issues and bug.

- A number of upstream bug fixes listed in https://opera.com/blogs/desktop/changelog-38
- Detach button wonâ€™t be visible in fullscreen anymore DNA-53205.
- Pop out video wont freeze anymore after moving source tab  to separate window.
- Security fixes as chromium is updated to version 50.0.2661.102.
